channel.title: [Donator] Items

item.title: [Donator] Items
item.dc:creator: @tobias222 tobias222
item.description:
@tobias222 wrote:

[quote=“Itachi Uchiha, post:5, topic:280309”][quote author=tobias222 link=topic=370296.msg2798961#msg2798961 date=1243257275]
Try:

sM(“Donator is not 0 or 1, but is “+donator+”.”);

I would be able to tell you where to put it etc if you tell me what source your using.
[/quote]

Wouldn’t sM instead of sendMessage for the method name point more towards a sign of Deltascape?[/quote]

Well, yes but I use it on my emulous source because it’s a lot shorter than sendMessage("");

Read full topic

item.title: [Donator] Items
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“tobias222, post:4, topic:280309”]Try:

if(donator == 1) {
wear item.
} else if(donator == 0) {
sM(“You need to me donator to use this item”);
} else {
sM(“Donator is not 0 or 1, but is “+donator+”.”);
}

I would be able to tell you where to put it etc if you tell me what source your using.[/quote]
You wouldn’t need the ‘if(donator == 1)’ because you only need to check if a member is a donor or not.

if(donor == 0) { sendMessage("You are not a donor; therefore, you cannot wear this item."); return false; }

Read full topic

item.title: [Donator] Items
item.dc:creator: @tobias222 tobias222
item.description:
@tobias222 wrote:

Try:

if(donator == 1) { wear item. } else if(donator == 0) { sM("You need to me donator to use this item"); } else { sM("Donator is not 0 or 1, but is "+donator+"."); }

I would be able to tell you where to put it etc if you tell me what source your using.

Read full topic

item.title: [Donator] Items
item.dc:creator: @Holy_Archer Holy Archer
item.description:
@Holy_Archer wrote:

Just a note, if(donator >= 0) { is no difference

There is no difference, you would need if(donator == 0){

Also, I have no idea on how to make them equip if they are a donator.

Read full topic

item.title: [Donator] Items
item.dc:creator: @Yorchi_elite Yorchi elite
item.description:
@Yorchi_elite wrote:

Hello, guys can some one help me with codeing so only donators can use some items.

if(donator >= 1) {
wear item.

if(donator >= 0) {
sM(“You need to me donator to use this item”);
}

can some help me.
